divs: Sighting Detailsi just walk out on porch look up and there it was glowing red an orange .it was just siting there .and it just disapeared.did not take off just disapeared.it was the size of a foot ball field.no body belives me but i saw it.i have not seen eny thing like it before i wish are gov would tell the truth about things like this .i thought it was a secert air plane or somthing .but have never seen eny thing like it.i would like to no if eny body seen a triange shape like this or have pitchures.
